Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EnemyClass
    Interface for Different classes of enemies.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Brute
    Implements the Enemy Class Brute, with 30 Base HP, 5 Base Attack Points, and special Defence ability of 0.5x multiplier if the damage is from a Direct Attack, and 2x if the damage is from an offensive object.
    Damage  
    Enemies  
    Guardian
    Implements the Enemy Class Guardian, with 15 Base HP, 2 Base Attack Points, and special Attack ability of 2x multiplier if the player last action was picking up a item.
    Soldier
    Implements the Enemy Class Soldier, with 20 Base HP, 3 Base Attack Points, and special Attack ability of 2x multiplier if the player last action was running
    Warlock
    Implements the Enemy Class Warlock, with 10 Base HP, 5 Base Attack Points, and special Attack ability of 2x multiplier if the player last action was running
